column1: Bourg-la-Reine (French: [buʁ la ʁɛn]) is a commune in the southern suburbs of Paris
column2: France. It is located 9.1 km (5.7 mi) from the center of Paris. The inhabitants are called Réginaburgiens.

column3: Bourg-la-Reine (meaning "Town of the Queen") was renamed Bourg-l'Égalité (meaning "Equality borough"). The name Bourg-la-Reine was restored in 1812.

column1: Bourg-la-Reine is served by Bourg-la-Reine station on Paris RER line B.
